messages.subject: We were all feces
messages.msgSnippet: Ok, I asked my husband... He has a better memory than I do in spite of smoking way more dope than I ever did. It was Peter Grace. In a speech to introduce Ron
messages.messageBody:
Ok, I asked my husband... He has a better memory than I do in spite of
smoking way more dope than I ever did.

It was Peter Grace.
In a speech to introduce Ron Reagan.
"Everyone who is for abortion was at one time a feces."

Deb L

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
